Atlanta Web Design Group

The group for Atlanta area people who make Websites. Markup, style, code, typography, SEO, e-commerce, Web apps, and social networking are all valid topics here. We aim to provide a place for Web professionals to meet new people, exchange ideas, learn new things, and have a little fun.

Latest News

November Progress Report

November 20, 2014

We’d rather not take too much time away from you looking a cat photos, so we’ll jump right in. There is progress to report on two fronts; front-end design and application architecture. This post will just talk about design. Moses will post some details about the architecture later.

A Starting Point

June 10, 2014

Here we are. This is the basis for our new website. But don’t get excited. This is not the final design! It’s just something we put together to serve as a placeholder for updates and other info while the website is being made.

Kickstarter Rewards

May 22, 2014

Thanks for making our Kickstarter campaign a success! We’re very excited to finally have our own website. Big thanks to the super talented and generous Jason Ottinger and John Williams for their work on creating these designs.
